website_summaries.verdict: The Turtle Beach Elite Atlas Aero wireless gaming headset offers a comfortable fit, good audio quality, and solid simulated suround sound for your PC.

customer_reviews.title: Great but not without problems.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent and the sound is superior. The comfort is impeccable and the overall build quality is next to perfect at this price point. The headset looks and feels premium however on xbox one, this headset has a persistent echo. I tried this headset 3 times through returns but sadly the echo made this product un-usable and I had to return this item. If you aren’t a talker, this headset is one of the best i’ve used, however if you like to talk in parties and game chat... This just isn’t the headset for you.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Received the Headset around 1.30 pm Today
customer_reviews.text: Received the Headset around 2 pm Today and after setting it up, I could hear my friend talking in discord but however he heard a really loud buzzing noise when I was trying to speak. I recorded myself using the windows 10 voice recorder and on play back instead of hearing me say "Hello" 10 times, I hear the same Buzzing noise instead. It May be so comfortable and high quility material but the Mic is broken and does not work. I returned the item within a hour of receiving it. Very disappointed with the Turtle Beach and especially for the price £84.99 which is not a budget headset.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Mic crackles so much they are not fit for purpose. :(
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love them. They are comfy. And the sounds alright when the mic is not on. Unfortunstely though when the mic is active it crackles very badly. Both on my end and for whoever is on comms with me. So they are just not fit for purpose. Maybe I just got a bad set? But they are Turtle Beach which is supposed to be a top brand in this field. And my experience so far is they are not living up to their hype. They will need to be returned. Time to search for another set.
customer_reviews.author: Scaramanda

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it used
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: bought this used. Great sounding headset, very comfortable. However extremely loud static would intermittently come on, to me and anyone I'm talking to. Seemed to be no fix, could may it quieter by flipping the mic up to mute but it never fixed it. Returning it. If I bought this new it may have been a great headset with no issues, alas I did. When it worked though it was great, just don't buy it used.
customer_reviews.author: Calum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price-performance.
customer_reviews.text: Moving from a £120 Sony wireless headphones I was pleasantly surprised. I don't believe there is a better headset at this price point which makes the drawbacks a very acceptable given. Used for FPS gaming. +Very comfortable fit around ear with no ear to driver contact or squashed pinna. +Relatively premium design +Light weight +Automatic mute when microphone raised +Volume wheel on left ear -No mute button -Not wireless -Was very difficult to get microphone to work and I am extremely tech savvy (build and mod comouters etc) tip: use all microphone boost features in microsoft. -No active noise cancellation however seal around ear is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good audio quality, GARBAGE everything else.
customer_reviews.text: They sound GREAT, unfortunately these headphones have so many problems. they could possibly be for just me personally, but i wouldn't recommend the headset because of my following experiences: - Uncomfortable - Microphone quality is AWFUL - The software for the headset uses too much CPU/Memory - Built in headset sound effects are too loud and ear piercing at max volume (e.g turning the headset on while it is full volume) - Turns itself off after ~10 minutes of no use, and as someone who leaves their desk regularly AND takes the headset off frequently because of the discomfort, the auto turn off is a TURN OFF.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Broken out the box
customer_reviews.text: When I received this headset I charged it as per instructions. However when turned on after 5 mins at most they stareded to crackle and when you flipped the mic down a deafining screach constantly. Contacted turtel beachhelp line really slow and not very helpful. Amazon offered a no hassle refund or exchange. I picked refund as I lost faith in turtel beach and picked another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Craig hewitson

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great headset worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Overall i like the headset, its extremely comfortable, although a little bulky if rather light and combined with the software the sound is excellent. I have only had a few issues regarding connectivity and a simple system restart solved this. The buttons are easily accessible and easy to navigate, an added bonus is being able to change the action of the dials so its not just volume, and the mic is very clear and of great quality. I would give 5 stars if i hadnt had some issues with connection.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: If you're a big gamer and you have Turtle Beach headphones get them
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and send it back because it already came opened and was damaged, but got another pair and everything was good extremely happy with it the sound quality is amazing to my old Turtle Beaches if you compare them to your old ones it is so comfortable and the sound quality is really really good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 months in and its broken already :D
customer_reviews.text: don't get me wrong, sound quality is crisp, you could hear an enemy from a mile away while in the middle of gaming but the headphones broke within the first year of purchase? They tried to make the headphones light but it is not durable at all. Recommended to buy two of these each year, one for the first half and the other for the remainder of the year, should come with a subscription feature for them. Now, how do I claim on the warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Lorna L.

customer_reviews.title: Good PC headset
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a good mute feature whereby you simply flip up the microphone. Good sound quality and volume control with a scroller. The headphones are not as comfortable as they could be and they could do with being able to be made slightly bigger. This however doesn’t stop me using them for great lengths of time sitting in front of the PC.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good sound ok Mic rubbish design
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this headset as a pc gamer who spends up to 10 hours a day online I found after a few hour this headset starts hurting your ears (a lot) I don't no why the sounds good the Mic good but noise cancelling is rubbish in a chat on discord my friends can hear my game volume thru my Mic on at only 30 % volume because of that i got a refund i never buy a turtle beach again
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with durability
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it an overall 3. The sound quality is amazing and the noise cancellation is great. It even has a sort of feed back so you can hear yourself talking, you know so you're not screaming all the time. However it did not last long only a couple of months and the microphone stoped working which is pretty bad considering the money you pay. Normally when I pay that price for a headset it lasts a year or so. So yeag disappointing
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and comfortable to wear, according to my son.
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with the headset. He said that the sound is very good and voices clear, and he commented on how comfortable it was to wear. It will be in interesting to see how long these last compared to cheaper ones he has had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bleeks

customer_reviews.title: The cable of noise
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were great till stopped working left ear pod after couple of months. Look great sounded great till left ear pod gave up. There a little heavy but really comfy. The one really bad thing about these is the cable....if it catches anything like your clothes the noise is pretty bad.....it vibrates through cable to your headset....can be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound, very comfortable and can use for along time with glasses on. Ps4 user
customer_reviews.author: Matthew blackmore

customer_reviews.title: Not well made at all
customer_reviews.text: Piece of s*** broke from simply opening it to put it on my head over and over again, you know like you would except. lasted about 6 months piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Absolutely Pathetic!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away! The worst experience I've ever had purchasing through Amazon. The initial headset I received came with a faulty dongle that wouldn't hold a connection for more than a few minutes and got hot to the touch regardless of whether it was in my pc or PS4. Ordered a replacement which arrived unsealed, missomg BOTH 3.5mm cable and the USB dongle making them utterly useless. Absolutely pathetic!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions easily / not good buy
customer_reviews.text: Disliked that it started to malfunction 4-5 days of having it, worked perfectly then when I switched from Pub G to Warzone it stopped working on right side sound went strange & kept cutting out, this is a PC head set I am on Xbox one, the headphones worked again one I unplugged & put it again, I have used my Apple headphone for over a year NEVER had one issue, just can’t speak to people and causing buzzing noice too, wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great audio and very comfortable, can be difficult to hear voice chat over game chat on occasions.
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for gaming and really does emphasis key sounds helping you pin point the source and location of enemies. Perfect for solo game play. Good comfort, allowing for long sessions of game play. The only fault in my opinion is that it can sometimes be difficult to hear teammates in game chat as the volume of certain games can overpower chat, with some people needing to shout or speak very loudly to be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really wow me like I wanted them too. Doesnt sound any different from my cheap sennheiser stereo headphones. Didnt bother with the mic as I have a separate usb one. Actually quite comfortable and the glasses feature was actually cool, but not enough to want to make me keep them. Overall not that impressed, so I'm returning them for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ant v

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, solid build
customer_reviews.text: Quality headset. I upgraded from turtle beach XO7 and I am not disappointed. The sound quality is detailed for gaming and loud enough to be immersive. The ear cups are comfy and adjustable for glasses but can get a little warm after a few hours. Microphone is good quality. I use a separate controller adapter for volume control so I cannot comment on the use of the inline controls
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Excellent & Elite!
customer_reviews.text: The Turtle Beach Gaming Elite Headset is Authentic! It's very Comfortable! It has Stunning Hearing Capacity! It's Tremendous for Definitely defeating Noise hearing everything in the background!
customer_reviews.author: Sonic bluestar Speed

customer_reviews.title: Nearly the perfect headset
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is second to none! And cancels out background noise perfectly. Only thing I found below par is the microphone. When in a party with friends they can never hear me. So much of an inconvenience I’m searching for a new pair. Such a same
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used turtle beach for years now I have gone onto pc gaming I thought I would try these sound quality very poor for the price I couldn’t recommend these
customer_reviews.author: m a cappleman

customer_reviews.title: Good head set
customer_reviews.text: Good head set, sound and mic good, the only annoying thing is the wire to hand set faces downwards and rubber on clothing etc, this can be irritating, but great head set
customer_reviews.author: steve sims

customer_reviews.title: My.mic ant working lol
customer_reviews.text: My headset worked fine. Then after 2 weeks my sound was really muffled. I struggled to hear my friends on xbox. I'm so annoyed cause ive always bought Turtle beach headsets and i liked this Atlas headset but last few days I've had to use a different cheaper headset. I want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Niamh Coss

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality headset
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned the Turtle Beach Stealth 450 but the plastic size adjustment broke on both sides after a year. This headset feels and looks a lot stronger. Sound is great. Cons: - It's a bit heavy for me. (my neck hurst after a while) - I have glasses and even after adjusting the special earpiece it still pushes my glasses into my head behind my ear. (only on the left side though).
customer_reviews.author: Younez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work - returned
customer_reviews.text: The software you need to properly use this headset is buggy and difficult to use, often requiring me to restart my whole computer to make it work. The headset itself wasn't the most comforable I've ever had but nor is it the worst. The worst thing about this headset is the mic. The sound quality was poor and to make things worse it transmitted cracking sounds when using discord or twitch.
customer_reviews.author: Sam McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 days no change to delivery date
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy an expensive headset spent £85 ponds to find it breaks after 3 days. The left ear phone stopped working, ordered a refund on the Saturday next day delivery was the only oppetion. Being in the hospitality sector having to work Sunday means it's difficult to get back to accept the delivery with no option to leave a note or to re arrange a delivery date....
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Avoid at all cost.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst pair of Turtle Beaches I’ve ever owned They just do not work like a head set should.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who had an xbox. Really happy apart from the mouthpiece doesn't have a switch..u rotate it instead otherwise she is very happy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Woof

customer_reviews.title: Good overall but too tight on head
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are good value for money but for me there was one deal breaker which is that the horizontal force from the headset is just too tight on my head. After a long session my jaw was aching and I couldn't eat crunchy food due to pain. So I really wouldn't recommend using this for long (4+ hour) gaming sessions as I did. I'm looking to sell and replace it now.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a present for my son, he loves them. Build Quality is very good, sound is stunning! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Had for couple weeks now and are excellent. Sound quality is really good and sits comfortably for long and short sessions. Got to make sure you do a driver update and install the software otherwise you don't get the full range of options you can toggle between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headset
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset I used too have a turtle beach 700 which was very low and not good bought this for Xbox one loud and perfect headset feels great on head and very comfortable for long periods of time gaming
customer_reviews.author: clara colcough

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great but we’re on our third pair!
customer_reviews.text: They are great headphones. The sound is amazing. Although I’m on my third pair, every one replaced by amazon. The metal part you plug into your device keeps cutting out on me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Big downgrade in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box sound quality was extremely disappointing, installed the software which improved it slightly but still no where near as good as the Razer Kraken 7.1 I wanted to replace due to falling apart. Sound has so little behind it, it is not impact full and has very little depth. You will not hear footsteps in games and you will find music less enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bull

customer_reviews.title: Good value gaming headset.
customer_reviews.text: Gaming, good sound, but a touch lacking. Can faintly buzz with the plug in to a controller. Thought it was my old controller so bought a new one but still very slight feedback. Comfortable for cooler climates. Annoying the direction the lead leaves the earpiece as can catch sometimes. But overall £100 set headphones are decent value with good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my ever growing gaming/streaming setup. Would recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Chivers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with my upgrade. very decent sound quality and also durable. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Adam Samy

customer_reviews.title: just the job
customer_reviews.text: for 15 year old - chosen by him and he said can't hear any outside noise with them on
customer_reviews.author: Karen Guest

customer_reviews.title: Awful crackling noise
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am returning this item. With the mic “up” and muted, the headset works perfectly well, as soon as you bring the mic down there is a terrible intereference/crackling which is so loud makes it unusable. Not sure if we just got faulty equipment??? Disappointed as previous Turtle Beach items have been very good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Groom

customer_reviews.title: Garbage with a £65 price tag
customer_reviews.text: Crackling discord audio, mic more sensitive than the average twitter user, refuses to work on PC. STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: 3 of my sons have these and they are brilliant, only need something to stop them screaming and squealing when they get too excited during a game.
customer_reviews.author: mumof4

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, high quality headset
customer_reviews.text: For someone like myself who games a lot it’s important for a headset to be comfortable and these certainly are! They also pick up on the faintest of noises from the game making it easy to figure out where the other team are. They also do a very good job at cancelling noise out from outside the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was cordless but it’s not still good to use for 10 year old and his games!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud buzzing and static sounds/Random switch-offs
customer_reviews.text: Turns off at random and you can hear a crackling sound when that happens. Loud buzzing while playing games and music. Mic doesnt work most of the time. When it does, it is poor. 4/10
customer_reviews.author: Chrisi Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it before delivery date which was a bonus,very comfy on the ears and very firm on the head fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good value but was let down by sound
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for the first few weeks but after that the sound kept discounting ever couple of hours
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! They feel nice, great construction and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Patrick A. G. Degenaar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these. He finds them comfy and likes the sound and how they look. Great service
customer_reviews.author: CAH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headset
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality, very comfortable and the sound is crystal clear also works well with Xbox one no setup just plug in and go. well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Volume wheel faulty
customer_reviews.text: The headphones give a decent representation of sound but unfortunately the volume control wheel is faulty and causes the sound to stop in either ear, like a faulty wire. This flaw showed itself after a couple of weeks, I've only had it for about a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: MartinBenson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product in this price range is more than impressive. The headset has an amazing built quality and sounds really good as well. Whether its gaming or just listening to music, this headset does it all quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Uts

customer_reviews.title: Microphone progresses to major distortion.
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. Microphone quality started off poor then gets progressively worse to the point of major distortion and annoyance. The feel of the headset is fidgety and uncomfortable for both short and long sessions. Not a good overall headset however sound quality is adequate . NOT WORTH THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Beach Atlas One Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 sets of Turtle Beach products. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cheap gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: Cracking set of headphones, nice and simple, they feel really comfy and the sound quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seb80

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, so glad not to have to hear his friends on fortnite. Love the added glasses spaces as I’ve always wanted something that made it more comfortable to wear glasses and headphones.
customer_reviews.author: caroline smith

customer_reviews.title: No Aux or Mic
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 weeks ago and came today without a mic or aux cord?? How am I supposed to use them?
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Hurts too much to wear even for a minute
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, worked well on Xbox One, PS4 and PC but they don't extend long enough and the top of the headset is way too hard and felt extremely uncomfortable immediately after putting them on to the point of causing me great pain and I can't use them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, at best.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality isn't bad, and the mic seems fine. However I've only had the headset for a year, and already am having problems with poor build quality. Sound cutting in and out, one ear working and the other not. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good value headphones, they are the same spec, as the pro version but cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: No issues 6 months Into using them. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: ReadyPig

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with no wireless transmitter
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no wireless transmitter, and the packaging was badly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: HarrisonB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headset
customer_reviews.text: Our son uses the headset for Fortnite on his Nintendo Switch. The headset has survived the daily abuse and looks/ feels high quality. Our son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuifje777

customer_reviews.title: Best Value headphones in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Out of all headphones I tried over the last few years, this has to be the best headphones I tried and was the best value. With so many features in these at such a small price point, I recommend everyone who has the money to buy these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Pietersen

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset. Very worth paying that little bit extra for a higher quality product. Had an issue in getting the mic to work, but it was the controller that was at fault. Maybe something to look out for. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the mic picks up the sound a little bit and it annoys my friends, you can fix that bu lowering mic volume, it will fix it but not 100%. other than that its an awesome headset
customer_reviews.author: Malik El Omar

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely appalling sound quality - no bass whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really bad product. The sound quality is so bad and there is no bass at all. Even a £10 headset / earbuds give much better sound quality. Please don't fall for the hype and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It good
customer_reviews.text: It’s not noice cancelling but I didn’t want that just thought I should let u know but wen in game ur 80% of the time not gonna hear others around u
customer_reviews.author: Caine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect love them worth the money for sure
customer_reviews.text: I play alot of tactical games PUBG and Rainbow and they are perfect I'm very stubborn to what I use for gaming and would not change these they are perfect and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Kyle colthorpe

customer_reviews.title: After a while the sound comes out of one ear
customer_reviews.text: After a while of using this hedset the conection gets loose and I can now only hear out of one side of the headset this is anoying as its suck an nice hedset and that it was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: olly

customer_reviews.title: Not as described - wired
customer_reviews.text: Not as described - "Amazons choice for turtle beach wireless" was the description but these are a wired headset - now have to wait 30 days for a refund before I can buy this birthday present again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few months ago and they've already stopped working. The sound quality is good and the mic works some of the time but the general quality of the headset is pretty poor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace qne quiet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and as he hasn't spoken to me for a few days now I'd they this product is quality
customer_reviews.author: Lee Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work wirelessly with Xbox
customer_reviews.text: My bad should of done some more research. They are wireless just not with a Xbox
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Really good for such a good price
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound quality for a good price and very durable only problem I have when your wearing them for more then 3-4 hours they start to feel quit heavy on your ears
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Abbott

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: hot these headphones didn't last long one side stopped working contacted support took ages to reply when they did told me to contact where I purchased them from but no way to contact them
customer_reviews.author: nab

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, crap durability
customer_reviews.text: Perfect at its job but the durability is crap. The microphone broke in the night and I wake up not be able to play after only 6 months of using. If you buy this, expect to pay £80 a year on headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Meaden

customer_reviews.title: Headset is absolutely bang on - However missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is exactly how described however upon opening the box, there was no transmitter included, which is absolutely necessary for audio and mic on PC. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Naughton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of the best headsets I have ever had and very affordable for a high end headset. So pleased with it that if it breaks ill buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Nick Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gaming headphones, crystal clear sound, very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tony Walters

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Second pair ordered for my son after his first set broke (his fault) after 2 years of use!!! Brilliant headset would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great but.....
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant until the mic broke (2 months in). Not drop, stepped on or mistreated in anyway, just one day there was nothing but interference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really good and spit on for any genre of games.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Jack breaks away from headphones
customer_reviews.text: Poor build quality. Lasted about 8 months. A waste of £40 as Amazon won't submit under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and amazing comfort
customer_reviews.text: Best healdset i have bought by far, if you wear glasses and hate the headsets that dig them in your head then this will solve it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Beach FTW!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Really cannot fault the headphones, surround sound is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Salty Nadsack

customer_reviews.title: only used on xbox
customer_reviews.text: so far so good for me, apparently my friends say there is an echo on there mics because of my new mic but all fine on my end!
customer_reviews.author: Eoghan Horgan

customer_reviews.title: KID’S HEADSET AT BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely devastated with this purchase as the product does not fit round my head. Shameful really. Expected a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sam

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: There is basically no noise cancellation but except from that everything else it good.
customer_reviews.author: A Random Person

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great headset and very comfortable for the price you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Better than most headsets
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Works on most pcs and other consoles. Better quality than most other turtle beach headsets
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Groves

customer_reviews.title: good kit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Good bit of kit and good value for money
customer_reviews.author: packhan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: Don't like this product at all, much prefer Astro A40s TR, a lot better in every way!
customer_reviews.author: fraser conway

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have a small cranium
customer_reviews.text: The audio sound is very good but I have one small issue, the microphone is simply too short for my big head.

customer_reviews.author: Samuel Roberts

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Elite Atlas Aero Wireless PC Gaming Headset
feature_bullets: Control Studio - Maximize your audio experience with this all-new comprehensive software suite that allows you to easily manage and customize audio settings from your desktop.

Waves Nx 3d Audio - Waves Nx delivers an immersive 3D audio experience by providing pinpoint location accuracy and lifelike sound enabling gamers to be inside the game. By recreating real-world sounds in a virtual space, Waves Nx 3D Audio surrounds the gamer in a natural environment creating a more accurate spatial scene so that they can easily pick out important sounds to help them win.

50mm Nanoclear Speakers - Elite Atlas Aero features Turtle Beach’s large, powerful 50mm Nanoclear over-ear speakers, tuned to deliver a vast soundstage as well as the clearest team chat via crisper sound with less distortion for a game changing audio experience.

EQ Audio Presets, Including Bass Boost - Enhance your gameplay experience with EQ audio presets including Bass Boost, Natural Sound, Bass and Treble Boost and Vocal Boost. Customize your audio experience by creating your own presets utilizing the 10-band equalizer.

Superhuman Hearing Optimized For PC - With Turtle Beach's exclusive Superhuman Hearing sound setting combined with Waves MaxxMultiband technology, you'll have the competitive advantage by being able to hear all the subtle yet game-changing sounds, like enemy footsteps and reloads.
